snippet.title: Live Coding: Android Bitcoin price checker (Java, Python, Kotlin)
snippet.description:
In this stream we build a Bitcoin price checking app three times! Once in Java with Android Studio, once using Kivy and Python, and finally with Kotlin. It's not the flashiest or best designed app, but it is functional and we learn a lot about the process of building Android apps. Kotlin wins over Java. Kivy is a great solution if it fits your needs.

GitHub: https://www.github.com/DevDungeon
Support the stream: https://streamlabs.com/devdungeon
Join Discord: https://discord.gg/JWsSHJC
Get $100 credit for signing up to Digital Ocean: https://m.do.co/c/5ccd98162d85 
Buy my book: Security with Go https://www.packtpub.com/networking-and-servers/security-go

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/DevDungeon
Download Streamlabs OBS and start streaming yourself for free: https://streamlabs.com/slobs/d/13836773
Opening music:  Song: Buzzsaw (feat. Zircon), Big Giant Circles & zircon, Imposter Nostalgia
